comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Laibach is the German name for the city of Ljubljana, now the capital of the nation of Slovenia, but in 1915 a part of Austria. These prisoners are at the Ljubljana Castle, used as a prison in 1915 and at many other times in its history. www.ljubljanskigrad.si/explore-the-castle/history/castle-... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ljubljana en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ljubljana_Castle
